summary:
The Game Boy is a popular handheld gaming device made by Nintendo. It was released in Japan in 1989 and later in North America and other countries. Designed by Gunpei Yokoi and Satoru Okada, it featured a simple design with a black and white screen, buttons, and interchangeable game cartridges.

Despite some critics not liking its basic graphics, the Game Boy became a huge success, selling over 118 million units worldwide. It was so popular that it outsold its competitors, like the Sega Game Gear. The Game Boy's design was updated a few times, making it smaller and adding color. Its success made it a well-known gaming icon.
title: Game Boy
